title: Ao Shin.....er....Aurelion Soul has some of the best potential for skins! It's crazy.
body:
{{champion:136}} I love this Dragon. I love this Dragon so gosh darned. His Star mechanics allow for some damn good skin potential, and I just want some skin dreams to come to life. Here are some of those ideas. 
Starting off silly.....


Surprise Party Aurelion Sol 
Passive: Balloons float around Ao Shin and make little rubbery noises when the hit someone. 
Q: Either a big smiley face is formed, getting happier as it flies, or Aurelion prepares a small cupcake that grows and grows into a bigger cake.
W: Duh, the balloons go further out
E: Aurelion flies around with party favors, making noise along the way with those little blowy noise maker things. 
R: He screams out a huge line of confetti and whipped cream and yells "HAPPY BIRTHDAY", or "SUPRISE", or something along those lines. 


Deep Sea Aocean....I MEAN DEEP SEA AURELION SOL! 
Passive: Either bubbles floating around Aurelion, or little tiny fish that either look very silly or very intimidatingly creepy ((like little anglerfish or piranhas) 
Q: A whirlpool is formed and or a big ol' bubble
W: spread out those fish/bubbles
E: Aurelion Swims through the air
R: Spews out a bunch of water
Aurelion himself has spooky angler stuff and bioluminescent patterns all over him, letting him still shine like a star, but from deep under the sea


FireCracker Aurelion Sol
He'd look like the Chinese Lion things. Lion Dance Kog'maw illustrates the idea well enough, only now it'd be on an egotistical dragon. 
Passive: Little rockets or flaring firecracker sparks 
Q: A big mesh of smoke and when it reaches the end it goes off like a big firecracker. 
W: Spread out those firecrackers
E: A trail of smoke trails behind aurelion and firecrackers spark when he stops traveling. 
R: Smoke and firecrackers flare out of Aurelions mouth, and or he just breathes out a bunch of fire. 

Anyway, those are just some ideas I had. ((I'm really hoping for that surprise party Aurelion Sol. He'd make the best spoiled birthday boy)). Thanks for reading through this all >_0*
